author: radekkapka
content: <@688748669268132001> <@449019668296892420> <@504202741933932544> <@539495253418180618>  Can we decide on https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3900 this week once and for all? During the last ACDC call <@504202741933932544> mentioned a comment by <@688748669268132001> which steered the disussion towards "do not implement", but <@449019668296892420> 's latest comment got a +1 from <@688748669268132001> , so I assume this was a non-issue and we should move forward with this. Am I right here?

author: radekkapka
content: The more we wait on this the less likely it will make it into the fork, obviously

author: radekkapka
content: I don't think we should wait until the next call to decide this, as it's more than a week away

author: tbenr
content: Yes you're right. I'm ok with moving forward.
